title: Staff Capacity Development Workshop for Improving Open and Distance Learning (ODL) Quality

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced science education and foundational understanding of Open and Distance Learning (ODL)
context.additional_context: A mobile-based microlearning course for in-service practitioners to enhance Open and Distance Learning (ODL) quality improvement capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more effective instructional design strategies for science domain ODL (Open and Distance Learning) courses
Learners can manage ODL project schedules with 80% or higher adherence through collaboration with stakeholders
Learners can develop two prototypes of science domain ODL content reflecting the latest instructional design theories

resources: Open and Distance Learning (ODL) Case Database in Science
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
